snippet: Skiers and snowboarders were taking hard spills at Rosa Khutor Extreme Park before the Games even began, and though changes were made, the runs remained treacherous.
abstract: Skiers and snowboarders preparing for the Sochi Olympics continue to complain that the Rosa Khutor Extreme Park is poorly constructed and dangerous; several athletes have taken violent spills while training on the course despite overnight changes by builders.
lead_paragraph: Skiers and snowboarders were taking hard spills at Rosa Khutor Extreme Park before the Games even began, and though changes were made, the runs remained treacherous.

headline.main: So Far, Extreme Park Is Proving Extremely Perilous
headline.print_headline: So Far, Extreme Park Is Proving Extremely Perilous
